TEXT.FORM: ﻿tɯmɲɯtsi tɯɣjɤn a-tɤ-kɯ-nɤmbrɯm qhe, tɕe tu-kɯ-lo qhe, nɯ ɯ-qhu tɕe maka mɤ-kɯ-nɤmbrɯm tu-ti ŋu tɕe. nɯnɯ, nɯ ɯ-qhu mɤ-kɯ-ngo nɯnɯ tɕe, kɤ-lo tu-ti-nɯ. aʑo tɤ-lo-a tu-kɯ-ti ŋgrɤl. tɕe tɤmbrɯm kɯ-fse nɯnɯra tɯ-lo ɣɤʑu ma tɕhomba kɯ-fse ra tɕe tɯ-lo maŋe. tɕhomba tɕe thɤjtɕu ɯ-ʁjiz tɤ-ɣe qhe ju-nnɯ-ɣi ɕti ma tɕe tɤ-mbrɯm-nɯ qhe, tɯɣjɤn a-tɤ-kɯ-nɤmbrɯm qhe tɕe nɯ ɯ-qhu mɤ-kɯ-nɤmbrɯm tu-ti-nɯ ɲɯ-ŋu ri, kɯ-xtɕi tsa a-tɤ-kɯ-nɤmbrɯm tɕe tɕe nɯnɯ ɲɯ-ɣɤmna tɕe nɯ sthi mɯ́j-sɤɣʑɯr thɯ-kɯ-wxti tsa tɕe shiduosui ɯ-qhu jamar tɕe tɕendɤre tu-kɯ-nɤmbrɯm tɕe wuma ʑo thɯ ɲɯ-ŋgrɤl tɕe ɲɯ-sɤɣʑɯr.
